page.title: 13LITERATURE
page.content: There are at least two authors in the village who have had several works published:{ G.S. Holmes}( Professor of History, Lancaster University ), whose latest major works include a book on Augustan England and 'The London Diaries of William Nicolson, Bishop of Carlisle, 1702 - 1718.' He has also written many essays, articles and reviews in learned periodicals. The other is {Jayne Fisher,} in her late teens, who started writing children's stories when 9 years old, under the heading of 'The Garden Gang'. 45 stories have so far been written and illustrated by this young author and published by Ladybird Books Ltd., and over 60 million copies sold. An elderly lady, { Miss Bertha Bratley, has published a few books of her poems depicting life in and around this Yorkshire village.
